Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 140th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Jeffrey Horne (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/2015, off Earnest Spillman (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2015, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2015...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 8/30/2016...
Injured on 3/8/2017 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/20/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $7,460,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2018, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2018, hitting .456 with 4 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/10/2018 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Traded from Houston to Colorado on 2/1/2019 (Going to HOU: C Adam Fasching, C George Bradley Jr.. Going to COL: C Toby Smalls)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/1/2019 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/2020 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
9/1/2020: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $3,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/15/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 4/7/2023.
